logistic.R: Metaquest integration backlog across automation, indices, governance hooks, and the 2026-08 activation tracker parity loop.
logistic.Theta: Parity brief anchored in docs/utac_status_alignment_v1.2.md + codexfeedback (pr-draft-0110) mirrored across bridge and beacons within 24h.
logistic.zeta: Damped when indices refresh, sigillin_sync telemetry is cited across lanterns, and activation-matrix recovery hooks close each sprint.

meta.resonance: Ensures the Metaquest launch is braided into the UTAC system spine: August 2026 activation telemetry, backlog hooks, and codex echoes stay synchronised so the campaign inherits reproducible logistics without fragmenting the Bedeutungs-/Shadow pairing.

threshold.Theta: brief lists latest telemetry date + codex reference before launch freeze

needed_resonances.null_guard: Missing timestamp or codex reference escalates to sci-shadow-003 and sys-shadow-004.
